guide.conclusion:
I hope this would be use-full for anyone who wants to make this.

Thank You! :)

flags.title: User-Contributed Project

guide.introduction: When im out and its raining I usually wipe my glasses off with my shirt. But that makes my shirt wet, so, I decided to make this portable squeegee. This lets you wipe off the water from your glasses without using your shirt and getting it wet.
guide.introduction_rendered: When im out and its raining I usually wipe my glasses off with my shirt. But that makes my shirt wet, so, I decided to make this portable squeegee. This lets you wipe off the water from your glasses without using your shirt and getting it wet.
guide.summary: This hand-held Squeegee lets you wipe off your glasses when its raining.
guide.title: Mini Squeegee
